column3: I've tried using `deriveaddresses` on a range of 10000 elements but I don't see any speedup with this compared to master. What command did you use to test?\n\nRegardless, I do think this is a good change, so utACK 41a46cbb31f1622f7d1ff54c7a1c1ca701c1e754

tACK 41a46cb

I'm seeing a substantial speedup using 41a46cb over master (66ce95a).

![addresses](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/863730/56075088-73a0dd80-5def-11e9-8bfa-b5a0dfa0272f.png)

Using a command like `time src/bitcoin-cli deriveaddresses "wsh(multi(1,xpub661MyMwAqRbcFW31YEwpkMuc5THy2PSt5bDMsktWQcFF8syAmRUapSCGu8ED9W6oDMSgv6Zz8idoc4a6mr8BDzTJY47LJhkJ8UB7WEGuduB/1/0/*
